channel.title: Task 2 - Python Checkpoint on TMC - 9 Digital Tech Semester 1

item.title: Selection
item.description: from The Computing Zone To be successful Follow this link to hand in your files. You will need to save each of the tasks in this set in its own file, with a simple naming system: 9. Advice please should be in a file named ex9.py, 10. Darts should be in a file named ex10.py and so on. You will be submitting these files to a system which will mark them automatically.
